welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ise, Japan! Experience the enchanting blend of tradition and modernity, and don't miss the famous Ise Grand Shrine. Enjoy your time exploring this beautiful city.

restaurants.name: Manpuku Shokudo (まんぷく食堂)
restaurants.description: Manpuku Shokudo (まんぷく食堂) is a japanese restaurant located in 伊勢市.
restaurants.address: 岩渕2-2-18 (宇治山田駅ショッピングセンター), 伊勢市, 三重県, 516-0037

restaurants.name: ちとせ
restaurants.description: ちとせ is a udon restaurant located in 伊勢市.

restaurants.description: Akafuku (赤福 外宮前特設店) is a wagashi place located in 伊勢市.

restaurants.description: Mameya (まめや) is a udon restaurant located in 伊勢市.

restaurants.description: コメダ珈琲店伊勢楠部店 is a café located in 伊勢市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
